2992:0: Viśālāmalavatī pramāṇasamuccayaṭīkā Chapter 2 dve eva pramāṇe pratyakṣamanumānaṁ cetyuktam|
2992:2: samprati prāptāvasaramanumānaṁ vyutpādayitumāha- anumānaṁ dvidhetyā- di|
2992:6: gamakalakṣaṇavidhānenaiva hi pratipipādayiṣorvacanānukramo darśita eva anyathābhidhāne gamakadha- rmādyotanāt|
2992:7: na hi ye yathā yamarthaṁ vidanti vacanajñāḥ te tatprati- pādane punarupadeśāntaramapekṣante||
2992:10: yathāvastu pratipādyamānā api hyanyathā nigadanto dṛṣṭāḥ upayogino'pyavi- nābhāvasyāvacanādanupayogināmapi ca sādhyopanayanigamanānāṁ prayo- gāt||
2992:11: trirūpāditi hetau pañcamī abhighātāc chabda iti yathā|
2992:12: atha va lyablope yathā prāsādamāruhya prekṣate prāsādāt prekṣate|
2992:13: tathā trirūpaṁ liṅgaṁ dṛṣṭvārthadarśanam- trirūpāl liṅgato'rthadṛgiti||
2992:15: kiṁ ca lī- no'rtho liṅgyate'neneti liṅgam|
2992:16: tac ca trairūpyaṁ vinā na sambhavati|
2992:28: avinābhāvitvaṁ hi sā- dhyād bahiriṣyate anyathānupapannatvaṁ tu dharmiṇyeva sādhya eveti|
2992:34: trairūpyamātre hi sa deśāntaragataḥ śyāmaḥ caitraputra- tvādityasyāpi hetutvaṁ syād iti||
2992:35: tatra yaduktam- avinābhāvitvaṁ hi paraiḥ sādhyādbahiriṣyata iti eṣo'dhyāropaḥ|
2992:36: sarvopasaṁhāreṇa hi yatra yatra sādhanadharmaḥ tatra tatra sādhyadharma ityaṣā vyāptiravinābhāvitvam|
2992:38: yadi ca sādhyadharmiṇyeva yaḥ sādhyadharmeṇāvinābhāvī sa heturi- ṣyate evaṁ sati yasya bahirapi sādhyenāvinābhāvas tasya hetutvaṁ na syāt|
2992:39: vyabhicāryapi ca hetuḥ syāt tasyāpi dharmiṇyanyathānupapanna- tvasya sambhavāt|
2992:41: ata evāsyāyuktatvān na catu- rlakṣaṇo heturupapadyate||
2992:42: yat punaruktam- trairūpyamātre hi sa syāmaḥ caitraputratvāditya- syāpi hetutvaṁ syāditi tadayuktam|
2992:47: anyas tu dvirūpo heturiti darśayannāha- ajñāto dharmiṇo dharmo dharme sanneva yatra hi|
2992:50: ajñāto dharmo jijñāsito'nityatvādir dharmiṇaḥ śabdāderyatra jñāyate kṛtakatvādau dharme|
2992:52: sanneveti pramātrā ghaṭādiṣu svayaṁ smaryate paro va smāryate parārthānumāne|
2992:53: sanneva nāsa- nnityetau vidhiniṣedhau yasya staḥ sa vidhiniṣedhavānhetuḥ|
2992:55: atra sādhyadharmo yatra sanneva nāsanniti bruvatā tadevānvayavyatire- kavattvamuktaṁ bhavati yasmādevaṁ sa tatra sanneva bhavati yadi tadabhāve heturna bhavatyeva|
2992:56: tataś ca trairupyamevākārāntareṇoktamiti na dvirūpo hetuḥ||
2992:58: trīṇi caitāni- abādhitaviṣayatvaṁ viva- kṣitaikasaṅkhyatvaṁ jñātatvaṁ ceti|
2992:59: tatrābādhitaviṣayatvaṁ tāvan na rūpānta- ram bādhāvinābhāvayorvirodhāt|
2992:60: avinābhāvo hi hetoḥ sādhyadharme satyeva bhāvaḥ|
2992:61: kathaṁ ca sa tallakṣaṇo dharmiṇi hetuḥ syāt na cātra sādhyadharmo bhavet|
2992:64: vyavacchedyābhāvād vivakṣitaikasaṅkhyatvamapi na lakṣaṇāntaratvena vā- cyam|
2992:66: sva- lakṣaṇayuktayoś ca hetvorekatra virodhinorupanipāte viruddhāvyabhi- cāritvaṁ bhavati|
2992:67: na ca yathoktalakṣaṇānāṁ kāryasvabhāvānupalambhānāṁ pratyanīko hetuḥ sambhavati|
2992:68: kathaṁ hi nāma ekaḥ svasādhyabhāva eva bhāvāt tenāvyabhicārī tatraiva cānyo'pi tadbādhakasya bhāva eva bhāvād viruddhas tena sambhavet|
2992:69: api ca sa heturyadi svabhāvata eva taddharmabhāvī tadārthāntaropanipāte'pi kathamanyathā syāt|
2992:70: na hi (5) vastūnāṁ svabhāvānyathābhāvasya viruddhasvabhāvadvayasya ca sambhavaḥ|
2992:71: atha svabhāvato'taddharmabhāvī evaṁ satyanyadāpi na sādhanaṁ kasyacit|
2992:72: tasmāt svabhāvata eva svasādhyāvinābhāvino yathoktalakṣaṇasya hetos tallakṣaṇaḥ pratiheturna sambhavatītyalakṣaṇamekasaṅkhyāvivakṣā|
2992:73: viruddhāvyabhicāryavacanaprasaṅga iti cet vastubalapravṛttaṁ liṅgaṁ pratīṣṭa- tvādadoṣaḥ|
2992:77: kiṁrūpāl liṅgādarthaḥ pratipattavya iti cintāyāṁ pratipatturavisaṁvādakasya rūpamu- cyate yaddarśanādayaṁ sādhanāsādhane pravivecya tasyeṣṭārthasādhanapratyayāt pravartate|
2992:78: tatra yadasya liṅgasyātmarūpam tal lakṣaṇam na pararūpa- m pratipattijanmanyupayogamātrāt tallakṣaṇatve'tiprasaṅgāt|
2992:82: tasmāj jñānamapi na liṅgalakṣaṇameṣṭavyamiti sthitame- tat- trirūpa eva heturiti||
2992:84: yathā pratyakṣe dvidhā phalamuktaṁ viṣayasaṁvittiḥ svasaṁvittiś ca tathehāpi pratyakṣavadavyatiriktamanumānasyādhigamā- tmakaṁ phalamiti bruvatānumānamapyadhigamasvabhāvamityuktaṁ bhavati||
2992:87: tuśabdo'vadhāraṇārthaḥ- etadeva dvayamatulyam adhiga- marūpatā tu tulyeti|
2992:89: tac cedabhinnam tat kimanyadrūpam yaducyate- rūpaṁ cātulyametayoriti|
2992:91: tathā hi- tat pratyakṣasya spaṣṭam aspaṣṭaṁ tvanumānasya||
2992:93: viṣayaśabdenātrālambanaṁ vivakṣitam na tu prā- māṇyasya viṣayaḥ|
2992:98: na hi tāvekasya vilakṣaṇā- vākārau yujyete|
2992:99: bhinna iti cābhinnapratiṣedha eva draṣṭavyaḥ na tu nā- (7)
2992:101: tac ca anumāna- sya sammato yo viṣayaḥ tasya tattvato'pariniṣpannatvāt||
2992:104: tasyākāraḥ svabhāvaḥ ākriyate paricchidyata iti kṛtvā|
2992:107: na tu nānāsvabhāvatānena pratipadyate sāmānyasya vikalpitatvenāsattvāt|
2992:108: tadetat sūcitaṁ bhavati- yasmāt pratyakṣasya bahirviṣayo'sti yatas tasya spaṣṭo viṣayapratibhāso bhavati na tvanumānasya yas tu tasyāsphuṭo viṣayākāraḥ sa sva- bījabalādeva jāyate tasmāt pratyakṣānumānayoryathoktaṁ svarūpaṁ bhinna- miti|
2992:109: atha vā pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṁ sākṣāt spaṣṭasvākārajanakaṁ prameyaṁ svarūpeṇa anumānasya tu tadeva pāramparyeṇāsphuṭaviṣayā- kārajanakaṁ pararūpeṇa prameyam|
2992:111: tadevaṁ yataḥ pratyakṣānumānayorbhinno viṣayaḥ atas tatsvabhāvaviśeṣāt spaṣṭāspaṣṭaviṣayākāratayā svarūpamapi bhinnamiti||
2992:113: kiṁ kāraṇaṁ svārthaparārthabhedenānumānameva dvidhā bhidyate na tu pratyakṣamityavadhāraṇena darśayati|
2992:114: etaduktaṁ bhavati- svayaṁ pratyakṣīkṛtasyārthasya parāvabodhanāya yad vacanam tat parārthaṁ pratyakṣaṁ dvitīyaṁ kasmān neṣyata iti||
2992:117: tatra ca yādṛ- śamanumānamātmanaḥ tādṛśameva parasantāne vācā kriyata iti yuktaṁ tasya dvaividhyam|
2992:119: na ca tatra yādṛśa- mātmanaḥ pratyakṣajñānam tādṛk śabdena santānāntare janayituṁ śa- kyate tasyānirdeśyatvāt|
2992:120: anyathāndhādīnāmapi śabdāt tathāvigha- meva sphuṭapratibhāsi jñānaṁ syāt|
2992:123: na ca tac chakyate nirdeṣṭum tasya pūrvamadṛṣṭatvāt|
2992:125: tasmāt tasyaiva grāhyaṁ nirdeśyam na pratyakṣasya||
2992:131: tato nānumānavat pratyakṣasya viṣayo nirdeśya iti||
2992:132: anye tvāhuḥ - vṛttabhaṅgabhayādatra yat paścād vaktavyam tat pūrvamu- ktam|
2992:133: tasmādevamatha grantho vijñeyaḥ- kasmādanumānameva dvidhā bhi- dyate na pratyakṣamiti pṛṣṭe kāraṇamāha- grāhyabhedādityādi|
2992:134: yadi grāhyabhedādanumānaṁ dvighā bhidyate evaṁ sati pratyakṣamapi dvidhā bhidye- tetyāha- svalakṣaṇamanirdeśyamiti|
2992:135: etaduktaṁ bhavati- īdṛśamidaṁ pratyakṣānumānayorgrāhyamiṣyate yatraikaṁ nirdeśyamanyadanirdeśyamiti|
2992:136: tasmādanumānameva dvidhā bhidyate yasya viṣayo vācā parasmai pratipā- dayituṁ śakyate na tu pratyakṣamiti||
2992:137: nanu cārthas tu rūpaṁ cātulyametayorityanena prāgeva pramāṇayorviṣa- yabhedaḥ pratipāditas tadbhedāc ca svarūpabhedaḥ|
2992:138: tat kimidamupanya- stam- bhinnaṁ hi pratyakṣānumānayoḥ svātmavad grāhyamityādi|
2992:141: sa tenaiva śabdenānumeyaḥ syāditi sa eva pratyakṣagrāhyo'rthas tataḥ śabdāt (10)
2992:145: paras tu jāḍyādimaṁ doṣamanavagacchan svayamabhyupagata- pramāṇaikaviṣayatvasya dṛṣṭānuvidhāyitāṁ darśayanniṣṭamevaṁ me taditi nanu cetyādinā sūcayati|
2992:147: sa eva ca rūpeṇānu- mīyata iti manyate|
2992:148: kadāciditi yadā sparśa indriyeṇa na spṛśyate tadetyarthaḥ|
2992:150: pratyakṣaṁ hi bhedāntaravimarśavi- vekena pratiṣṭhitenaiva rūpeṇa sparśaṁ paricchinatti anumānaṁ tu smārtā- kṛṣṭapūrvānusandhānataḥ- so'yaṁ mayā pūrvamanena rūpeṇa saha prāgupala- bdha iti sparśasāmānyamasparśavyāvṛttam|
2992:152: yathā rūpaṁ na pratyakṣato gṛhyata ityeva svalakṣaṇā- kāreṇa liṅgaṁ bhavati viśeṣasyānanvayāt api tu sāmānyākāreṇaiva pūrvadṛṣṭānusaṁhitena tathā na sparśaḥ pūrvapratyakṣeṇa gṛhīta ityeva svala- kṣaṇato'numeyaḥ kiṁ tu sāmānyākāreṇaivānumānayogyeneti darśayati||
2992:154: yadi yathānubhūtamācakṣate evaṁvyava- hārā āryā yujyante|
2992:155: tvanmatena tu svalakṣaṇamupalabhyānyadeva kathayatāṁ vyavahārā anāryāḥ syuḥ|
2992:158: te ca sati svasminnimitte āryaiḥ prayujyante nāsatītyāryā vyavahārā abhyupeyante na tu svalakṣaṇābhidhānāditi nābhyupetabādhe- ti||
2992:161: nanu ca naiva cakṣurvijñānā- nubhūta eva kṣaṇo manovijñānenānubhūyate|
2992:167: tulyajā- tīyatvāc ca pūrvottarayoḥ kṣaṇayorabhedavivakṣayaivamabhihitaṁ syāt|
2992:169: tataś ca cakṣurvi- jñānena sahotpannamevārthaṁ vijānātītyayamatrārtha ityadoṣaḥ|
2992:170: yadi yat (12) tanmanovijñānānubhūtaṁ svalakṣaṇam tadanirdeśyam kathaṁ mano nīlaṁ ca vijānāti nīlamiti cāviṣṭābhilāpaṁ tadeva|
2992:176: tac ca vijānāti na kevalaṁ svalakṣaṇam|
2992:182: tathā hi- yadyākārāntareṇa mano nirdiśati na tarhi tena cakṣurvijñānānubhūtameva nirdiṣṭaṁ bhavati|
2992:183: atha tadeva svalakṣaṇaṁ nirdiśati na nāmākārāntare- ṇeti||
2992:191: lānanavadagrahaṇāt sparśamātraṁ vāyuriti pareṇākte tatparihārāyāha- adṛṣṭasyāpi liṅgataḥ samadhigamaṁ kariṣyāmaḥ|
2992:194: na ca dṛṣṭānāṁ sparśa ityadṛṣṭa- liṅgo vāyuriti|
2992:197: nirvṛkṣakṣupe deśe śukaśukāśabdaḥ samupalabhyate tṛṇādināṁ ca dhṛtiḥ|
2992:198: teṣāṁ dravyāntareṇāsati pratibandhe gurutvāt pātaḥ syāt|
2992:205: na cāsau pūrvaṁ dṛṣṭaḥ tatprathamataḥ sparśavi- śeṣeṇa grahaṇādityasāmānyaviṣayamanumānam||
2992:207: tacchabdena sparśa eva sambadhyate na tu vāyuḥ||
2992:208: (14) ata evāha- na hi tad vāyvādiṣvityādi|
2992:213: atha vā tacchabdena vāyureva sambadhyata iti darśayannāha- na vā vāyvādisvabhāveṣvityādi|
2992:214: asyārthaḥ- yo guṇaḥ sa dravyāśritaḥ gandhavat|
2992:216: sparśasya guṇatvād dravyā- śritatve'numite dravyatvamātramarthataḥ sidhyati|
2992:217: tad yathā cakṣurādīnāṁ pārārthye siddhe paro'pyarthataḥ sidhyatītyabhiprāyaḥ||
2992:224: teṣāṁ hi sparśavattvād ghaṭādīnāṁ tatra pratighātaḥ syāt|
2992:229: tasmāt pariśeṣād vāyorevāyaṁ sparśa ityeṣā pariśeṣasiddhiḥ||
2992:232: yasmād- nyeṣāṁ yasyāsambhavaḥ tatra siddhasattāke tasyāstitvaṁ sambhāvyate|
2992:233: yasya tu sattvamevāsiddham kathaṁ tatra pariśeṣāt so'stīti sambhā- vyate|
2992:234: na hi- yadānyena tatra sannihitena puruṣeṇedaṁ kāryaṁ na kṛtamiti sambhāvyate tadā vandhyāsutena pariśeṣāt kṛtametaditi yuktaṁ sambhā- vayitum|
2992:235: teṣveva tu kenedaṁ kṛtamiti saṁśayo bhavati||
2992:237: siddhe'pi tasya sattve pratiṣedhasya tu- lyatvān na yuktamanumānam|
2992:238: yathaivāyaṁ sparśaḥ pṛthivyādiṣu na dṛṣṭacara iti teṣāṁ na bhavati tathā vāyāvapi prāṅna dṛṣṭa iti tasyāpi mā bhūt|
2992:239: kathaṁ tarhi vāyoḥ pariśeṣasiddhirityāha- siddhe hītyādi|
2992:240: yathotpa- ttimatāṁ ghaṭādīnāṁ sattvaṁ siddham tathā yadi vāyvādīnāṁ jijñāsitā- nāṁ sattvaṁ siddhaṁ bhavati evaṁ sati hetoḥ siddhatvaṁ labhyate nānyathā|
2992:242: siddhe'pi teṣāṁ sattve yadi sa dharmaḥ pramāṇena bādhyate'gnāviva śaityam evamapyasiddha eva hetuḥ syāt viparyayāt tu siddha ityevaṁ yathā hetoḥ siddhatvaṁ janyate tathā darśitam|
2992:248: guṇaviśeṣeṇeti yathoktena sādhyadharmiṇi si- ddhasattākenānvayavyatirekavatā dharmeṇa|
2992:249: dravyaviśeṣānumānaṁ kriyata iti pariśeṣād vāyuranumīyata ityarthaḥ|
2992:250: tatrāpi sāmānyākāreṇeti veditavyam na tu svarūpeṇa yasmāt prāgevānumānasya svalakṣaṇavi- ṣayatvaṁ niṣiddham|
2992:252: tatrāyaṁ prayogaḥ- yo yataḥ siddhasattākādanyeṣāṁ na sambhāvyate vastudharmas tatra ca pramāṇenābādhitaḥ sa tasya bhavati|
2992:253: tad yathotpattimadbhyaḥ siddhasattākebhyo'nyeṣāmasambhāvyamānamanityatvaṁ vastudharmas tatra pra- māṇenābādhitaṁ bhavati|
2992:254: vāyoḥ siddhasattākādanyeṣāṁ na sambhāvya- te'nuṣṇāśītasparśo vastudharmas tatra ca pramāṇenābādhita iti sva- bhāvaḥ|
2992:255: evaṁ sparśasya pariśeṣād vāyusambandhitve siddhe vāyuḥ kvacid deśaviśeṣe kālaviśeṣe vā sidhyati|
2992:256: tvanmatena tveṣāṁ pariśeṣasiddhirna bhavatīti darśayannāha- sattvaṁ tvasiddhamityādi|
2992:257: yasmāt sattvama- siddhaṁ tulyaś ca pṛthivyādibhiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tasmādguṇaviśeṣābhā- vaḥ trairūpyavato dharmasyābhāva ityarthaḥ|
2992:261: evaṁ tāvad dṛṣṭādṛṣṭebhyaḥ pratiṣedhamabhyupetyānu- mānābhāva uktaḥ||
2992:262: samprati pratiṣedha evāyukta iti darśayannāha- yadyadarśanamātre- ṇetyādi|
2992:263: mātragrahaṇenopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya yadadarśanam tata evābhāvaḥ sidhyatīti sūcayati|
2992:267: tatra ca tūlopalapa- llavādiṣu tadbhāve'pi sparśabhedadarśanāt kvacid viśeṣasyāpi sambhavāc chaṅkayā bhāvyamiti sarvatrādarśanamātreṇāyuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ||
2992:268: adṛṣṭebhyo'pi na yukta iti darśannāha- na hyadṛṣṭebhya ityādi|
2992:271: abhighātasya vāyaṁ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt tadviparītasya vā vastuno vidhiḥ|
2992:272: yadi pratiṣedhaḥ abhighātasparśaviśeṣayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo vyāpya- vyāpakabhāvo vā vācyaḥ yato hetuvyāpakāveva nivartamānau svaprati- baddhe kāryavyāpye nivartayataḥ anyathātiprasaṅgāt|
2992:273: kāryakāraṇavyā- pyavyāpakabhāvau ca na sidhyataḥ vināpyabhighātena sparśaviśeṣasya bhāvādarthāntaratvāc ca|
2992:275: ghātākhyaṁ vastvevocyate paryudāsavṛttyā tasya tarhi vyomādhibhiḥ sambandhaḥ sādhyaḥ sparśaviśeṣeṇa ca virodhaḥ|
2992:276: anyathā kathaṁ tadasa- mbaddhamaviruddhaṁ ca tenaitat tatra bādhata atiprasanṅgo vā||
2992:278: tathā hi- teṣu tasya vṛttirvā sambandhaḥ syāt tajjanyatā vā|
2992:279: na tāvad vṛttiḥ sidhyati teṣāmatī- ndriyatvāt|
2992:281: na ca vino- palambhenātredaṁ vartata iti śakyate niścetum|
2992:283: na hyanvayamātrāt kāraṇasya sāmarthyaṁ gamyate api tu vyatirekādapi|
2992:284: sa ceha nāsti nityatvāt sarvagata- tvāc ca vyomādināṁ tadabhāve tadabhāvāsambhavāt|
2992:292: manasi ca guṇopajani- tavyatirekanibandhanā ṣaṣṭhī nānumeyāpekṣā|
2992:294: guṇasya guṇāpekṣāyā nityatvāt sāmarthyābhāvado- ṣo'pi nāsti|
2992:297: vibhutvaṁ nāma guṇo'numeyaḥ atha ca sukhādayaḥ pratyakṣāḥ tathā mana- so'pyaṇutvamekatvaṁ cānumeyametadguṇadvayaṁ syāt ayaṁ ca sparśaḥ pratyakṣo guṇaḥ syāditi na kaścid virodhaḥ||
2992:298: idānīṁ yadatra yuktam tat pratipādayitumāha- kiṁ tarhītyādi|
2992:300: kathaṁ punar- dṛṣṭeṣu ca dṛṣṭatvādityetaduktam yāvatā sa sparśaviśeṣo dṛṣṭeṣvapi naiva dṛṣṭaḥ||
2992:304: yo yatra dṛṣṭasāmānyaḥ sa tatra sambhavati|
2992:307: atha vā yo yatra dṛṣṭaḥ sa tatra sambhavadviśeṣaḥ|
2992:312: yadyevaṁ niścayena bhavitavyam- atrai- vāyaṁ sambhavatīti|

2992:631: sa tvanayaiva diśā gamyata iti vṛttau noktaḥ|
2992:632: sūtre tv ekaikadvidvirūpaś cetyatra caśabdas tatsamuccayārtho draṣṭavyaḥ|
2992:634: yatra hi kaści- drūpaikadeśo 'sti sa tadvadābhāsamāno buddhiṁ viparyāsayatīti sa evātrocyata iti||
2992:636: ye tvanyathecchanti tanmataṁ nirākartumupanyasyati- atra tvityādi|
2992:638: yena yasyāvyabhicāro na kathyate na tat tasya sādhyam|
2992:640: na ca sādhyadharmeṇa hetoravyabhicāro na kathyata iti vyatirekiṇaṁ svabhāvaṁ manyante||
2992:642: yat siddham na tat sādhyam uṣṇo 'gniriti yathā|
2992:645: yo hi kevalaṁ dharmaṁ sādhyamicchati tenāvaśyaṁ tatraiva liṅgaṁ draṣṭavyam|
2992:647: na hyanya- tra viditaṁ liṅgamanyaṁ pratyāyayati mā bhūdatiprasaṅga iti|
2992:648: tataś ca liṅgagrahaṇakāla eva liṅgino gatatvāt kimaparamanumīyeta yadarthaṁ sambandhaḥ smaryeta||
2992:650: sa eva deśo'gnimattvena kiṁ neṣyata ityevaśrutiḥ kevalasya dharmasya (41)
2992:652: evaṁ kevalo dharmaḥ sādhyatvena yujyate yadi dharmī nāsyadhāratveneṣyate|
2992:653: anyathā yatra dharmiṇi liṅgamupalabhyate tatrādhāra āśrīyamāṇe samudāya eva sādhyaḥ syāt|
2992:656: dharmamātre hi sādhye sattāsya sādhyā syāt|
2992:657: tac cāyuktam tasyāḥ siddhitvāt yadāha- na hya- gnisattā na pratīteti|
2992:658: tadanena- yat siddhim na tat sādhyamityā- dikaṁ pūrvoktaṁ svabhāvaviruddhamāha||
2992:661: na hyagneḥ pradeśasya ca saṁyogalakṣaṇe sambandhe vahnidhūmau vidyete|
2992:662: yadi tatra dvayaṁ nāsti kimiti tasya sādhyatvaṁ na bhavatītyāha- evaṁ ca kriyata ityādi|
2992:664: atra yadi pradeśaḥ sādhyaḥ syāt yujyeta tābhyāṁ tasya pratyavamarśaḥ|
2992:665: anyathāgnidhūmau svaśabdena nirdiṣṭau prade- śo'pi nānumeyaḥ|
2992:666: sambandhe'pi dvayaṁ nāstīti nirviṣayau tau syātām|
2992:667: tadanena- yatrāgnidhūmau na staḥ na sa dhūmenānumeyaḥ ja- lavat- na staś cāgnidhūmau sambandha iti viruddhavyāptamāha||
2992:669: sambandhavivakṣāyāṁ hyagniśabdaḥ ṣaṣṭhyantaḥ syāt yathāgneruṣṇaḥ sparśa ityatra|
2992:671: tato ganyate- nātra sambandho vivakṣita iti|
2992:675: ṣaṣṭhīśravaṇābhāvena parārthānumāne sphuṭamupalabhya sambandhābhāvaṁ svārthānumāne'pi pratipā- dayati|
2992:676: tadetaduktaṁ bhavati- yatrāgniśabdaḥ prathāmāntaḥ na tatra sambandhasya pratiyogino vivakṣā|
2992:681: yadā tarhyanityaḥ śabda iti prathamāntayoreva dharmadharmiṇoḥ prayogaḥ tadā kā kalpanā|
2992:685: tasyāpi ca sambaddhasya pradeśe sādhyamānatvāt sa eva samudāyaḥ sādhya ityāpannam||
2992:686: avācyaḥ svadharmeṇeti sambandhanaṁ hi sambandha iti bhāvarūpeṇa sambandhaśabdenābhidhānāt|
2992:689: tataś ca samba- ndhyeva sa bhavatīti na svarūpeṇa sambandho'bhidhīyate|
2992:693: yadi śabdavācyo na bhavati kathaṁ tarhi pratīyata ityāha- arthagṛ- hītaḥ syāditi|
2992:696: ataḥ saiva pratīyamānā nāntarīyakatvāt saṁyogaṁ gamayatītyarthagṛhīta ityu- cyate adhikaraṇaśaktisvakāryonnīyamānatvāt||
2992:699: yadapyuktam- kāryānumeyaḥ sambandha iti tadapi svakāryānumeyatvāduktam na tu dhūmādiliṅgānumeyatvāt|
2992:700: etaduktaṁ bhavati- yadi nāma sambandho'sti svakāryeṇaivānumīyate na tvanyena dhūmādineti|
2992:701: yadāha- na tu dhūme- nānumīyata iti|
2992:703: sambandhe'pi dvayaṁ nāsti ṣaṣṭhī śrūyeta tadvati avācya ityetebhyaḥ||
2992:704: (44) na cāsau liṅgasaṅgata iti nāvinābhāvalakṣaṇena sambandhena liṅgena sambaddha ityarthaḥ|
2992:705: yasya yenāvinābhāvitvaṁ na pradarśyate na sa tenānumīyate yathā dhūmena jalam|
2992:706: na pradarśyate ca sambandhena dhūma- syāvinābhāvitvam|
2992:712: yatra pradeśādāvagnyādiḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ tatra prasiddhaṁ dhūmādiliṅgaṁ yena dharmeṇa tadavinābhūtamanalādinā tatsambaddhaṁ pradeśādikaṁ dharmiṇaṁ gama- yiṣyatītyevamartham||
2992:715: ayama- nyatraśabdo dharmiṇi sādhye pradeśādau vartate|
2992:718: atha vā mātraśabdenedaṁ darśayati- vināpi dharmiṇānugamadarśaneneti||
2992:719: eṣa samāsārthaḥ- dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇo'numeyatve'pi yo'gninā dhūmasyāvinābhāvo mahānasādau pradarśyate sa upāya eva pradeśasyā- gnimattvaprasādhanāyeti kṛtvā|
2992:720: tathā hi- yatra dhūmaḥ tatrāgniriti niścayādanyatra dhūmamātraṁ dṛṣṭvā deśamagnimantaṁ pratipadyate|
2992:724: tatra na tāvad viśeṣeṇa pradarśa- yitavyaḥ anyatra tasyābhāvitvenāśakyatvāt yadāha- anyathā hītyādi|
2992:725: dharmisāmānyena tu sambhavatyavinābhāvaḥ sa ca tena prada- rśitaḥ yadāha- ādhārasāmānyena tvityādi|
2992:726: ādheyenāvinā- bhāvitve darśyamāna ādhāreṇāpi darśitaṁ bhavati ādheyatantratvādādhāra- sya||
2992:727: atha vā yatra dhūmaḥ tatrāgniriti nānena dhūmasyāgnimātreṇāvinā- bhāvitvaṁ kathyate|
2992:731: sambandhena tu sarvathāvinābhāvitvasyā- darśanamevetīdamuktam- viṣama upanyāsa iti|
2992:733: na ca tasya vipakṣe vṛttiriti nānekāntaḥ||
2992:735: pūrvamanumeyagato vicāra uktaḥ idānīṁ tu sādhyadharmagato vicāraḥ|
2992:738: sa punarvicāro yāveva liṅgaliṅginau dharmivadanekadharmakau yathāgnidhūmau tatraiva pratyāyyapratyāyakāṁśanirūpa- (46)
2992:740: tatrānekadharmakatvāsambhavāt kenāṁśena gamyagamakabhāva ityāśaṅkā na sambhavatyeva||
2992:743: yoṁ'śo vahni- manugacchati dravyatvādi tasyānyato vipakṣād vicchedaṁ vyāvṛttiṁ gamayati|
2992:744: ke punarviśeṣā anubaddhā ityāha- yān antarenāgnirna bhavatīti|
2992:745: nanu ca dhūmasya sūcakatvād yān antareṇa dhūmo na bhavatīti vaktavyam|
2992:748: tathā hi- yānantareṇāgnirna bhavati dhūmo'pi tairvinā na bhavatyeva||
2992:749: atha vā ye tvanubaddhā iti dhūmasyaivānubaddhā iti yojyam|
2992:751: ta eva hi dhūmamanubadhnanti yānantareṇāgnirna bhavati|
2992:753: kasmānnivṛttimātraṁ pratyāyayati na viśeṣamityāha- svasa- mbandhānurūpyādityādi|
2992:756: sarvatrānagnau na dṛṣṭa ityanena vyatire- kasya prādhānyaṁ vipakṣe sarvatrādarśanena khyāpayati|
2992:758: apiśabdena kvacin na dṛṣṭo'pīti dyotayannanvayasyāprādhā- nyam|
2992:759: tadevaṁ yasmādanvayopasarjano vyatirekapradhānaḥ sambandhaḥ sa ca (47)
2992:760: sāmānyenaiva sambhavati na viśeṣeṇa tasmāt tadānurūpyād vyatire- kamukhenāgnirevātrānagnirna bhavatītyanagninivṛttimātraṁ pratipādayati na viśeṣam|
2992:761: yathā cāgnitvena sambandhaḥ tathā dravyatvaguṇitvā- dibhirapīti|
2992:767: tathā hi- tat sarvatrādravye na dṛṣṭam dravye dṛṣṭam|
2992:768: tatrādravyavyavacchede prathamenāstyekavṛddhiḥ yadapekṣayā gandhenai- kavṛddhyā vyavacchedaḥ kriyate|
2992:770: ata eva ca guṇatvasyāpyekavṛddhyā vyavacchedakaraṇaṁ pratyaṅgabhāvo 'sti|
2992:771: yadi hi tenādravyavyavacchedo vidhīyate evaṁ gandhenaikavṛddhyā vyavacchedaḥ kriyate nānyathā|
2992:772: evaṁ ca śloke dvandvasamāsāntaḥ pātitvaṁ guṇatvaśabdasyāviruddhaṁ bhavati tulyakakṣyatvāt padāntaraiḥ|
2992:774: pārthivamidaṁ dravyaṁ ca gandhatvādityapā- rthivādadravyāc ca vyavacchedaḥ kriyate|
2992:776: gandhavadetat saurabhyāditi saurabhyeṇa pūrvakābhyāmasurabhisādhā- raṇāc ca vyavacchedaḥ kriyate|
2992:777: surabhergandhaviśeṣasya sādhāraṇaṁ sāmā- nyaṁ surabhisādhāraṇam gandhatvamātramiha vivakṣitam|
2992:778: avidyamānaṁ surabhisādhāraṇaṁ yasya tat tathoktam nirgandhamityarthaḥ|
2992:780: tadevamadravyādivyavaccheda ekaikavṛddhyo- tpalādiṣu guṇatvādibhiḥ kriyamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ||
2992:781: sa kathaṁ yujyate yadi vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhena hetuḥ pratyāyayati nānyathā dṛṣṭavat|
2992:782: vidhimukhena hi sarveṣu sarveṣāṁ darśanasyāviśiṣṭatvāt tulyā pratītiḥ syāt|
2992:784: ye tu tan necchanti tān pratyāha- dṛṣṭavadityādi|
2992:785: dṛṣṭena tulyaṁ dṛṣṭavat yathā pūrvaṁ sambandhakāle liṅgam upalabdham tathā yadi prakāśayedityarthaḥ|
2992:788: evaṁ sarvatrādarśanān na syāt prakāśanamiti jñeyam prakāśayediti prakrāntatvāt||
2992:790: yadyevamabhyupagacched vidhivādī- yasmād vahnāveva dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ nāgnyabhāve tasmādgamayatīti evaṁ sati pratiṣedhadvārakameva prakāśanaṁ syāt|
2992:791: tasmāt tenaivamabhyupeyam- yasmādagnau dṛṣṭa eva na tvadṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt sa taṁ gamayatīti|
2992:793: na hi sarvatra so'gnau dṛṣṭaḥ digdaśādibhinne sarvatra vahnau darśanāsambhavāt||
2992:795: yadā hi dhūmo'gnau dṛśyate tadā dīptādīnāṁ viśeṣāṇāmanyatamena yukta eva dṛśyate|
2992:798: tasmān na darśanamātramanumeyapratipattihetuḥ satyapi tasmin tadabhavāditi|
2992:801: kārya- kāraṇabhāvaś ca darśanādarśanābhyāṁ sahitābhyāṁ sidhyati na kevalā- dadarśanādityāha- yatastvityādi|
2992:803: sāmānyarūpeṇaiva prakāśayati na viśeṣarūpeṇa dīptādinā tasmāt kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhaye vidhināpi tadevāsya rūpaṁ dṛṣṭamiti gamyate na viśeṣarūpam kāryakāraṇavyavahārasiddhihetutvenetyabhiprayaḥ|
2992:804: na hi dīptādiviśeṣadarśanaṁ kāryakāraṇavyavahārasiddhihetuḥ tadabhāve'pi dhū- masya darśanāt|
2992:805: aṁśena janyajanakabhāva iti cet na tajjanyaviśe- ṣagrahaṇe'bhimatatvāt sarvathā janyajanakabhāvasya|
2992:808: tasya ca prativyakti sarvātmanā parisamāptatvādekasyāmevāgni- vyaktau darśanopapattiḥ|
2992:809: tasmāt sarvatrādarśanān na syāt prakāśana- mityayuktametadityāha- sāmānyaṁ yadyapītyādi|
2992:811: abhyupetya tu doṣa ucyata ityetad darśayati||
2992:813: yadi vyakteranyat sāmānyaṁ syāt bhedena buddhau pratibhāseta na ca pratibhāsate|
2992:815: athānanyat evamapi vyaktivat tat sāmānyameva na syāt|
2992:818: yadanekāśrayasādhāraṇama- gṛhītasakalāśrayam na tad draṣṭuṁ śakyam yathāgṛhītasakalāśrayaṁ dvitvādi|
2992:824: athaikāśrayagrahaṇe'pi samastaṁ gṛhyate evaṁ sati tasya pratyekaṁ sarvātmanā parisamāptatvādguṇavadanekatvaṁ syāt|
2992:825: na hyayaṁ sambhavo'sti- yadekatra sarvātmanā parisamāptam tadanyatrāpīti|
2992:826: yadanekatra pratyekaṁ sarvātmanā parisamāptam tadanekam guṇavat|
2992:830: anekatvāc ca tat sāmānyameva na syāt āśrayavat|
2992:837: pāṇḍutvamiha dhūmasambandhyeva vivakṣi- tam na tu dadhiśarādivṛtti tasya vyabhicārāt|
2992:838: dravyatvādayo'pi tarhi yadā dhūmopādhayo gṛhyante tadā tairapi kimiti na pratyāyayati|
2992:843: uktamevārthaṁ saṅgrahaślokābhyāṁ saṅgṛhṇāti sukhapratipattaye- gamyante liṅgatas te'pīti|
2992:844: te'pyanubandhino dravyatvādayo gamyante nāgni- tvādika eva dharmaḥ yas tadānīṁ boddhumiṣṭa ityapiśabdasyārthaḥ|
2992:847: liṅgānubandhinas tvarthā ityaviśiṣṭā dravyatvādayaḥ sāmānya- dharmāḥ|
2992:849: te cāviśiṣṭadravyatvādisā- mānyāpekṣayā viśeṣā ityucyante na tvasādhāraṇarūpāpekṣayā||
2992:853: tataś ca yathāyaṁ saṁyogitve saṁyoginornāsti viśeṣaḥ tathā liṅgaliṅginorapi na syāt|
2992:854: evaṁ ca liṅgasāmānyamapi gamakaṁ syāl liṅgiviśeṣo'pi ca gamyaḥ syāt sambandhasyāviśe- (53) ṣāditi|
2992:861: tac ca liṅga eva vartate na liṅgini|
2992:862: abhyu- petya tu dviṣṭhatvaṁ sāhabhāvye satyuttaramucyata iti darśayati|
2992:864: ādhārādheyayoriva vṛttis tasya liṅgaliṅgisamba- ndhasya na tu saṁyoginoriva||
2992:874: sa ca liṅga eva vartate na liṅginītyamunāvadhāraṇadvayena pratipādyate|
2992:878: yadi- yatra yatra liṅgam tatra tatra liṅgī bhavati|
2992:879: liṅginas tvanyatra vṛttiranena na pratiṣidhyate liṅge tadabhāva- mātravyavacchedaphalatvādavadhāraṇasya|
2992:880: tataś ca liṅgini nāvinābhāvi- tvaṁ vartata ityuktaṁ bhavati liṅgādanyatrāpi tadbhāvasūcanāt|
2992:882: tasmāt teṣāmapi dhūmo gama- kaḥ na tu dīptādīnām|
2992:883: na hi te dhūme bhavantyeva yadāha- tasmād yuktamityādi|
2992:884: liṅginyevetarat punarityanenāpi liṅga evāvinābhā- vaḥ pravartata iti sūcayati liṅgino'nyatra liṅgaṁ na bhavatītyarthagateḥ|
2992:885: liṅginas tu liṅgādanyatra bhāvo na pratiṣidhyate|
2992:886: yathā ca dhūmatvamagnau bhavatyeva tathā pāṇḍutvādayo'pi viśeṣāḥ|
2992:887: tasmāt te'pi gamakāḥ na tu dravyatvādayaḥ|
2992:888: na hi te'gnau bhavantyeva yadāha- tasmād yukta- mityādi|
2992:890: (55) nanu pūrvaṁ liṅgasya liṅgini sadbhāva uktaḥ tattulye sadbhāva iti vacanāt|
2992:891: iha tu liṅgino liṅge sadbhava ucyate liṅge liṅgī bhava- tyeveti vacanāt|
2992:894: liṅgaliṅginore- kādhikaraṇatve yathā liṅge liṅgī bhavati evaṁ liṅgamapītaratra|
2992:895: kevala- mavadhāraṇavaiparītyena liṅga eva sambandho vartata iti pratipādanāyeda- mucyate|
2992:896: yadi tarhi liṅga eva vartate kathaṁ sambandho liṅgaliṅgino- rityuktam|
2992:897: liṅga eva vartamāno'pyasau liṅginaṁ pratiyoginamapekṣya vartata ityevamuktam na tu dviṣṭhatvādityadoṣaḥ||
2992:898: nanu cetyādinā yaduktam- niyamasya viparyāse sambandho liṅga- liṅginoriti tad vighaṭayan liṅginyapyavinābhāvo vartata iti darśayati||
2992:899: kāmamityādinā yadyapi liṅgamapi kiñcil liṅgini bhavatyeva tathāpi liṅgirūpeṇaiva|
2992:900: evaṁ ca kṛtakatvasādhyāpekṣayā hetubhūta evāni- tyatve'vinābhāvo vartata iti darśayan svapakṣameva sthāpayati|
2992:904: yat tadvyāpitvam tal liṅgiviṣayamiti liṅgini vyāpītyuktam|
2992:908: tato vyāpitvāt kṛtakatvaṁ gamyameva bhavati na gamakam|
2992:910: yathā viṣāṇaṁ gorvyāpitvādgavāpekṣayā gamyameva sampadyate na tu gamakam tadvaditi|
2992:911: yo yatra bhavatyeva sa tasya gamakaḥ|
2992:919: tena liṅgasya yā vyāptiḥ sāpekṣyata āśrīyate tasyā eva gamakatvahetu- tvāt|
2992:920: tasmāl liṅgasya liṅgiviṣayā yā vyāptiḥ sā vidyamānā- pyakāraṇam gamakatvasya na nimittamityarthaḥ||
2992:922: yadyapi sakalānityatvavyāpi kṛtakatvam tathāpi na tena vyāpitvena tasya gamakatvam api tu nityatvapratiṣe- dhena|
2992:925: na hi vipakṣā- davyāvṛtto hetuḥ sādhyaṁ gamayati prameyatvavat|
2992:927: yadā kṛtakatvasiddhaye'nityatvaṁ hetutvenopādīyate tadāpya- nityatvasyāśeṣakṛtakatvavyāpitve'pi na tena vyāpitvena gamakatvam|
2992:930: tadevaṁ yataḥ svasādhyavipakṣavyāvṛttyā hetorgamakatvaṁ bhavati nānyathā tasmād yadanityārthe kṛtakatvasya vyāpitvam tenākṛtakatvānava- kāśād anityatvasyākṛtakatve'navakāśādanavasthitatvādasambhavāc cānityatvena kṛtakatvasyākṛtakatvapratiṣedhenākṛtavyavacchedena ga- myataiva syāt|
2992:932: na tu gamakatvamiti yasmād vipakṣāpracāreṇa yā vyāptiḥ sā gamakatvanimittam|
2992:934: tathā hi- yadanityam tat kṛtakamiti vyāptāvupada- rśitāyāṁ na nityāt kṛtakatvasya vyāvṛttirgamyate|
2992:937: tato'nityatvamevākṛtakatve'navakāśamityakṛta- katvapratiṣedhena gamyataiva kṛtakatvasyānityatvena yujyate na gama- katvamityuktārthasaṅgrahaṁ ślokābhyāṁ karoti||
2992:939: anityasya kṛtakatvena vyāpterani- tyatvādakṛtakaṁ na tadityayamartho'prasuta eva gamyate|
2992:941: yas tu prakṛto nityatvābhāvo'nityatvam sa tayā vyāptyā kṛtake'rthe na pradarśyate||
2992:942: asyaivārthasya spaṣṭīkaraṇāya dvitīyena ślokena dṛṣṭāntamāha- aviṣāṇitvaṁ nivartayediti viṣāṇitvaṁ gamayedityarthaḥ|
2992:945: yo'rtho yamantareṇa na bhavati sa tasya nāntarīyakaḥ yathāgnerdhūmaḥ|
2992:949: sambandhasmṛtyapekṣatāṁ liṅgadarśanasya darśa- yitum- tadvida ityuktam|
2992:950: yas taṁ vetti- nāntarīyako'yamiti tasyānumānam nānyasya||
2992:952: tasya hi nāntarīyakatvameva sva ākāro bhavati|
2992:954: na hyata- dvido nāntarīyako'yamiti darśanaṁ sambhavati|
